product.name: Modern Comfort Sofa
product.description: Luxurious and comfortable 3-seater sofa with premium fabric upholstery. Features deep cushions and solid wood legs for durability and style. Perfect for modern living rooms.

product.name: Minimalist Dining Table
product.description: Elegant dining table with clean lines and natural oak finish. Features durable construction and seats up to 6 people comfortably. Ideal for both everyday meals and special occasions.

product.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
product.description: Premium office chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh backrest. Designed for maximum comfort during long work hours.

product.name: Classic Bookshelf
product.description: Versatile bookshelf with 5 adjustable shelves. Made from high-quality engineered wood with a walnut finish. Perfect for displaying books, photos, and decorative items.

product.name: Memory Foam Mattress
product.description: Premium queen-size memory foam mattress offering perfect balance of comfort and support. Features cooling technology and hypoallergenic cover for a restful sleep experience.

product.name: Scandinavian Coffee Table
product.description: Stylish coffee table with clean Scandinavian design. Features solid wood legs and a white tabletop with storage shelf. Complements any modern living space.

product.name: Modern Floor Lamp
product.description: Contemporary floor lamp with adjustable head and marble base. Provides warm, ambient lighting for any room. Energy-efficient LED bulb included.

product.name: Storage Ottoman
product.description: Multifunctional ottoman with hidden storage space. Covered in durable linen fabric with tufted top design. Perfect for organizing living spaces while adding extra seating.

product.name: Rustic Dining Chairs (Set of 4)
product.description: Set of four rustic dining chairs with solid wood frames and comfortable upholstered seats. Features classic design with modern touches for timeless appeal.

product.name: Modern Desk Lamp
product.description: Sleek desk lamp with adjustable arm and LED light. Features touch control with multiple brightness levels. Perfect for home office or study area.

product.name: Contemporary Nightstand
product.description: Contemporary nightstand with two drawers and open shelf. Made from high-quality MDF with matte finish. Ideal for bedside storage and display.

product.name: Velvet Accent Chair
product.description: Luxurious accent chair upholstered in soft velvet fabric. Features curved design with gold-finished metal legs. Adds elegance to any living room or bedroom.

product.name: Wall Mounted Shelves (Set of 3)
product.description: Set of three floating wall shelves in varying sizes. Made from solid wood with metal brackets. Perfect for displaying books, plants, and decorative items.

product.name: King Size Bed Frame
product.description: Modern king-size bed frame with padded headboard and wooden slat support. No box spring needed. Features clean lines and premium upholstery for a contemporary bedroom.

product.name: Glass Dining Table
product.description: Elegant glass dining table with chrome-finished metal base. Tempered glass top ensures safety and durability. Seats up to 6 people and adds a modern touch to any dining area.

product.name: Executive Desk
product.description: Spacious executive desk with drawers and cable management system. Made from premium oak with a dark finish. Perfect for home office or professional environments.

product.name: Sectional Sofa
product.description: Modular sectional sofa with chaise lounge. Features reversible configuration and premium microfiber upholstery. Perfect for family rooms and entertainment spaces.

product.name: Pendant Light Fixture
product.description: Modern pendant light with brass finish and glass shade. Adjustable hanging height and compatible with dimmer switches. Creates elegant ambient lighting for dining areas or entryways.

product.name: Dresser with Mirror
product.description: Six-drawer dresser with attached tilting mirror. Features solid wood construction with smooth gliding drawers. Perfect for organizing clothes while adding style to any bedroom.

product.name: Bookshelves with Desk
product.description: Combination bookshelf and desk unit with integrated workspace. Features adjustable shelves and cable management. Ideal for small spaces and home offices.
